籤詩版本二:
Dole ne ku yi magana da gaske kuma ku tuna kada ku nemi wasu ƙwarewa a wasu wurare.
Dole ne ku tsaya ga tsohuwar rayuwar ku, babu wani abu da zai yi muku kyau
詩意:
Wannan hexagram alama ce ta kasancewa mai ra'ayin mazan jiya da kuma kan lokaci.
Yana da kyau a kasance masu ra'ayin mazan jiya a komai.
解曰: Zauna da zama. Abin sha'awa da nasara. Kada ku yi wani abu kuma. Ku kasance masu ra'ayin mazan jiya.
籤詩故事一:
◇King Wen ya roƙi duba
Sarki Wen na daular Zhou ya kware wajen duba, Sarki Zhou ya kira shi a wancan lokacin, Sarki Wen ya yi la'akari da cewa wannan tafiya ba ta yi sa'a ba kuma za ta haifar da rashin sa'a na tsawon shekaru bakwai, don haka ya gaya wa babban dansa Boyi, ya yi mulkin Qi (sunan). na wurin) bisa ga doka kuma kada ku fita waje.
Daga baya, Sarki Zhou ya sa Sarki Wen a gidan kaso a Youli (sunan wurin).
A lokacin, babban ɗan Sarki Wen ya je ya ceci mahaifinsa, amma an kashe shi saboda ya manta umarnin mahaifinsa.
聖意: Gidan da kansa ba ya da kyau, neman arziki da sa'a, ciniki, aure, Liujia ƙararrawa, Chitian silkworm maki biyar, lalacewar dabbobi shida, bacewar mutane, shari'ar jama'a, ƙaura, masu ra'ayin mazan jiya, asarar dukiya, rashin lafiya, mummuna cuta, Kabarin Anshan ya kamata. a canza.
